channel.title: Help Changing Login
channel.description:
[URL=http://img252.imageshack.us/i/helpc.jpg/][IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/1153/helpc.jpg[/img][/URL]
So that blank background is what I'm looking for, with text over saying "username & password" etc.
I've changed the background by changing the title.png, but when it finished loading, it shows that messy center. I just want to to match the rest, so I can have it all that brownish color and have the "username & password" on top of it.
Anyone know how? I've tried looking for another png with that same center, but I can't find one.
Thanks.

item.title: Help Changing Login
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

[quote=“MoreWeed, post:2, topic:375791”][quote]Anyone know how? I’ve tried looking for another png with that same center, but I can’t find one.
[/quote]

there should be another image file for the center[/quote]

Another .png with that same look, right? I couldn’t find one…

Read full topic
